Package DatabaseAccess

Class AppointmentQuery

java.lang.Object
DatabaseAccess.AppointmentQuery
public abstract class AppointmentQuery extends Object
This class controls all queries to the database related to appointments.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AppointmentQuery()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static String
    appointmentsByContacts()
    Queries the database for appointments then groups them by contact and uses them to build a string, with a string builder that is suitable for displaying in the report TextArea.
    static String
    appointmentsByTypeMonth()
    Queries the database for appointment types, then groups them by type and month and uses them to build a string with a string builder, that is suitable for displaying in the report TextArea.
    static String
    appointmentsByUser()
    Queries the database for appointments then groups them by User and uses them to build a string, with a string builder that is suitable for displaying in the report TextArea.
    static ArrayList<String>
    appointmentsInFifteenMinutes()
    Queries the database for all appointments scheduled in the next fifteen minutes.

    delete(int appointmentID)
    Deletes an appointment whose ID matches the parameter from the database.

    Returns an ObservableList of appointments filtered by customer ID.

    filterByMonth()
    Queries the database for all appointments scheduled in the current month and returns them in an observable list suitable for filling the appointment TableView.

    filterByWeek(LocalDateTime today)
    Queries the database and returns a list of appointments scheduled in the week following the date parameter (including that date).

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentQuery

      public AppointmentQuery()

  • Method Details

    • insert

      public static void insert(String title, String description, String location, String type, ZonedDateTime start, ZonedDateTime end, ZonedDateTime createDate, String createdBy, ZonedDateTime lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerID, int userID, int contactID)
      Function to insert a new appointment into the database.
      Parameters:
      title - appointment title.
      description - appointment description.
      location - appointment location.
      type - appointment type.
      start - appointment start ZonedDateTime.
      end - appointment end ZonedDateTime.
      createDate - date appointment is created.
      createdBy - user who created the appointment.
      lastUpdate - date appointment was last updated.
      lastUpdatedBy - user who updated the appointment last.
      customerID - the customer ID of the customer attending the appointment.
      userID - the user ID of the user related to the appointment.
      contactID - the contact ID of the contact related to the appointment.

    • delete

      public static boolean delete(int appointmentID)
      Deletes an appointment whose ID matches the parameter from the database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - integer ID of appointment to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful, false otherwise.

    • selectAllToTableViewList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> selectAllToTableViewList()
      Queries the database for all appointments and returns them in an observable list.
      Returns:
      an Observable list of all appointments in the database. Suitable for filling TableViews.

    • modifyAppointment

      public static void modifyAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdateBy, int customerID, int userID, int contactID, int appointmentID)
      Sends a modify appointment query to the database. Modifies the appointment whose ID matches the appointmentID parameter.
      Parameters:
      title - appointments title.
      description - appointment description.
      location - appointments location.
      type - appointment type.
      startTime - appointment start ZonedDateTime.
      endTime - appointment end ZonedDateTime.
      lastUpdate - date it was last updated (should be current date).
      lastUpdateBy - name of person/program which updated the appointment last.
      customerID - integer customer ID of customer attending appointment.
      userID - integer ID of user related to appointment.
      contactID - integer ID of contact related to appointment.
      appointmentID - integer ID of the appointment to be modified.

    • appointmentsInFifteenMinutes

      public static ArrayList<String> appointmentsInFifteenMinutes()
      Queries the database for all appointments scheduled in the next fifteen minutes. It then uses a string builder to build an arraylist of strings which is suitable for displaying in a report.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of strings formatted for the reports window text area.

    • filterByCustomerID

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> filterByCustomerID(int customerID)
      Returns an ObservableList of appointments filtered by customer ID. Used when checking overlapping customer appointments.
      Parameters:
      customerID - int customer ID used to filter appointments.
      Returns:
      observable list of appointments matchingt the customer ID parameter.

    • filterByWeek

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> filterByWeek(LocalDateTime today)
      Queries the database and returns a list of appointments scheduled in the week following the date parameter (including that date). Suitable for filling the appointment TableView.
      Parameters:
      today - LocalDateTime of start of week range.
      Returns:
      Observable list of appointments scheduled in the next week.

    • filterByMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> filterByMonth()
      Queries the database for all appointments scheduled in the current month and returns them in an observable list suitable for filling the appointment TableView.
      Returns:
      Observable list of appointments scheduled for the current month.

    • appointmentsByTypeMonth

      public static String appointmentsByTypeMonth()
      Queries the database for appointment types, then groups them by type and month and uses them to build a string with a string builder, that is suitable for displaying in the report TextArea.
      Returns:
      string formatted to display all types by month in the report TextArea.

    • appointmentsByContacts

      public static String appointmentsByContacts()
      Queries the database for appointments then groups them by contact and uses them to build a string, with a string builder that is suitable for displaying in the report TextArea.
      Returns:
      String of appointments listed by contact, formatted for display in the reports TextArea.

    • appointmentsByUser

      public static String appointmentsByUser()
      Queries the database for appointments then groups them by User and uses them to build a string, with a string builder that is suitable for displaying in the report TextArea.
      Returns:
      String of appointments listed by User, formatted for display in the reports TextArea.
